instructions: On the Home screen, tap the phone icon to open the Phone app. Swipe right to go to the Call History tab. Do one of the following: Tap a name or number in the list to call. Press and hold a name or number in the list to display the options menu. Tap Dropdown icon to display just a particular type of call such as missed calls or outgoing calls.
On the Call History tab, tap Add icon next to the new phone number. Choose whether to create a new contact or save the number to an existing contact.
